parameters.name: responsetype
parameters.description: Input method.  'ask' lets you choose in-task.  'keyboard' uses keyboard responses, 'audio' uses voicekey (which can be a bit buggy).

parameters.name: scorerealtime
parameters.description: For audio, set this to 1 to score real-time with keyboard. otherwise, you need to go back through and code responses afterward.

parameters.name: usepreset
parameters.description: If set to 1, it will use the same sequence of stimuli every time.  If set to 0, it will  regenerate randomly on each run.

parameters.name: custompractrials
parameters.description: Number of trials to use for practice, if usepreset = 0.

parameters.name: customtrials
parameters.description: Number of trials to use per block, if usepreset = 0.

parameters.name: practicethreshold
parameters.description: Practice threshold--must achieve this accuracy to move beyond practice round.

parameters.name: maxpracticerounds
parameters.description: Most practice rounds to use--it will continue after this. You may wish to remove anyone who does not meet this threshold.

parameters.name: voicekeythreshold
parameters.description: The voice key will trip when this proportion of the last gVoiceKeyDuration 1-ms bins are above the threshold. Based on input power and microphone noise, you may need to adjust these parameters.

parameters.name: voiceKeyDuration
parameters.description: Number of bins back to test for being above threshold for the voice key

parameters.name: saveAudio
parameters.description: Should the audio buffer be saved to a file?
